TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ContractHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ContractHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides methods that the binary rewriter uses to handle contract failures.

span.span: Provides methods that the binary rewriter uses to handle contract failures.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string RaiseContractFailedEvent (System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailureKind failureKind, string userMessage, string conditionText, Exception innerException);

.method public static hidebysig string RaiseContractFailedEvent(valuetype System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractFailureKind failureKind, string userMessage, string conditionText, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Shared Function RaiseContractFailedEvent (failureKind As ContractFailureKind, userMessage As String, conditionText As String, innerException As Exception) As String

public: static System::String ^ RaiseContractFailedEvent(System::Diagnostics::Contracts::ContractFailureKind failureKind, System::String ^ userMessage, System::String ^ conditionText, Exception ^ innerException);

param.name: failureKind
param.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of failure.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of failure.

param.name: conditionText
param.span: The description of the condition that caused the failure.

span.span: The description of the condition that caused the failure.

param.name: innerException
param.span: The inner exception that caused the current exception.

span.span: The inner exception that caused the current exception.

summary.span: Used by the binary rewriter to activate the default failure behavior.

span.span: Used by the binary rewriter to activate the default failure behavior.

returns.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the event was handled and should not trigger a failure; otherwise, returns the localized failure message.

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the event was handled and should not trigger a failure; otherwise, returns the localized failure message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks バイナリ リライターがコントラクト エラー リスナーに通知するには、このメソッドを呼び出します。The binary rewriter calls this method to notify listeners about a contract failure. メソッドがエラー時の動作 (アサートまたは throw) を実行していない自体です。The method does not perform the failure behavior (an assert or throw) itself. メソッドを返しますのかどうか、エラーは、リスナーによって処理、`null`です。If the failure is handled by the listeners, the method returns `null`. リスナーによって、エラーが処理されない場合は、ローカライズされたエラー メッセージが返されます。If the failure is not handled by the listeners, a localized failure message is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 既定のエラー動作をさせるは、 、これにより、 **Assert** ダイアログ ボックスを表示します。The default failure behavior is to raise an , which causes the **Assert** dialog box to be displayed. ダイアログ ボックスを表示する代わりに例外をスローするには、その動作を変更することができます。You can change that behavior to throw an exception instead of displaying the dialog box.
